Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Our product offers unparalleled value, with an estimated worth of $12,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together and delivering exceptional results. Best regards, Alice. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
